AUTHOR: Mark Twain

QUOTE: It is the working man who is the happy man. It is the idle man who is the miserable man.

QUOTE: The pay is good and I can walk to work.

QUOTE: All things are difficult before they are easy.

QUOTE: To be a poet is a condition, not a profession.
AUTHOR: Robert Frost

QUOTE: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening.
AUTHOR: Mahatma Gandhi

QUOTE: The sun is new each day.

QUOTE: Thank God every morning when you get up that you have something to do that day, which must be done, whether you like it or not.

AUTHOR: Walter Bagehot

AUTHOR: Demosthenes

AUTHOR: Abraham Lincoln

AUTHOR: Albert Einstein
